# tg_service_users (Data Source)

Fetches service users from Trustgrid



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name_filter` (String) Filter service users by name (substring match)
- `status_filter` (String) Filter service users by status (active, inactive)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `names` (Set of String) List of matching service user names
- `service_users` (List of Object) List of service users (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_users))

<a id="nestedatt--service_users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `service_users`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String)
- `policy_ids` (List of String)
- `status` (String)
